title: Sound On: CR Vote, Biden Climate Action (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: CR Vote, Biden Climate Action (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Congressman Henry Cuellar of Texas, Jim Kessler, Co-Founder at Third Way, John Sitilides, Partner with Trilogy Advisers, and David Tafuri, Former Obama Campaign Foreign Policy Advisor.


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
